Advisory.Description: madskristensen Miniblog.Core through 2019-01-16 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary ASPX code via an IMG element with a data: URL, because SaveFilesToDisk in Controllers/BlogController.cs writes a decoded base64 string to a file without validating the extension.
Advisory.Summary: Moderate severity vulnerability that affects MadsKristensen.AspNetCore.Miniblog
